Package ru.nsu.buzyurkin.pizzeria

Class RandomOrderGenerator

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
ru.nsu.buzyurkin.util.StoppableThread
ru.nsu.buzyurkin.pizzeria.RandomOrderGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class RandomOrderGenerator extends StoppableThread
Represents a random order generator for the pizzeria, responsible for generating random orders.

  • Constructor Details

    • RandomOrderGenerator

      public RandomOrderGenerator(int minTime, int maxTime, int ordersCount, BlockingQueue<Integer> orderQueue, OrderTable orderTable, int maxOrderSize)
      Constructs a RandomOrderGenerator object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      minTime - The minimum time interval for generating orders.
      maxTime - The maximum time interval for generating orders.
      ordersCount - The total number of orders to generate.
      orderQueue - The order queue to add generated orders to.
      orderTable - The order table to add generated orders to.
      maxOrderSize - The maximum size of an order.

      Overrides the run method of StoppableThread to define the behavior of the random order generator.

    • allFinished

      public boolean allFinished()
      Checks if all orders have been finished generating.
      Returns:
      true if all orders have been generated, false otherwise.
